titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices and Council. A proclamation. Charles Porter, Tho: Coningesby. Whereas by our proclamation of the nineteenth of November last, we did declare, that we would not give protection to any person who then had a son in the enemies quarters, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook assignee of Benjamin Took printer to the King and Queen at Their Majesties printing-house on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at The Council-Chamber in Dublin, the 17th day of January, 1690.".
Date given according to Lady Day dating.
Steele notation: Arms 199. Nineteenth whereas p.2) before recei-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
